ComicInfo.Title: Big Deal; Robot War; Peace, Love & Harmony; Cracked Interviews the Doll Queen; Ron Rover; Rock 'n' Roll Fairy Tales; A Day in the Life of the Uggly Family Game; Canine the Barbarian; USA Superforce; Cracked Action-Adventure Hero Sandwiches!; You Know You're a VCR Freak If...; Cobrat
ComicInfo.Summary: One robot carries a gun in his briefcase; another carries a boombox.
